Line.MultilineString: At the center of the village stands a goblin shaman, surrounded by a mound of corpses. It gestures with its hand to direct the goblins to undamaged houses, shouting in its harsh language.
This beast seems to be the leader of the group that destroyed your village. Now is the time to get your revenge. You draw your weapon and attack!
You strength fades, the sheer numbers slowly overwealming you. Finally you miss a block and a sword takes you in the neck, sending you tumbling down into oblivion.
You stand victorious over the bodies of the goblins, the raiding group finally defeated. The shamans staff glimmers in the muck and you take it as spoils.
Together with the rest of the survivors you eventually head towards the nearest city, Gladsheim, to seek out a new life.
